task: Create HarmonyInsight.tsx component to display user's interpretation
description: Create a styled component in `src/components/` that receives HarmonyEngine output and presents the insight, dominant/weakest categories, and an optional theme label.

requirements.title: UI Elements
details: Paragraph insight text styled with soft typography
Tags for dominant/weakest categories (e.g., badges or chips)
Call-to-action text or button (e.g., 'Start a healing plan', if provided)

requirements.title: Styling
details: Use theme color or dominant category color (fallback to neutral)

requirements.title: Error Handling
details: If required props are missing, render nothing or a fallback message
